children.text:
1. Go to "Settings > Manage Apps" to add/remove application from Kids Place.

 2. Application launched from Kids Place will be locked based on settings.

 3. Pressing Home button (or any other unauthorized actions) while using apps launched from Kids Place will take the user back to Kids Place home screen. Pin is required to exit from app.

 4. Go to "Settings > Parental Controls" to fine tune lock settings to your needs.

 5. Checking the "Lock home button" setting makes Kids Place more secure by changing Android home temporarily. *Recommended*

 6. Checking the "Auto restart apps" setting causes a launched app to restart within a few seconds of it terminating. If your child has a habit of accidentally exiting apps this setting can come in handy.

 7. Checking the "Airplane mode" setting turns off all wireless signals while Kids Place is running to prevent your child from getting exposed to device radiation. It is important to remember that you will not receive any phone calls and will not have any data connection when this mode is turned on.

 8. Checking the "Enable wallpaper" setting causes the background of Kids Place to either use the the image you have chosen by clicking the Wallpaper icon in the main menu. When this setting is not checked a black background is used.

 9. Checking the Start on device reboot setting causes Kids Place to start automatically when the device is restarted. 
IMPORTANT: Autostart of Kids Place on device restart occurs ONLY if Kids Place is running while the device is restarted or turned off!

 10. Please make sure to remember the pin. However, if you forget your pin please visit http://www.kiddoware.com/forgotpin.php to recover it.
